document.full_text: vancouver canucks center manny malhotra was cleared on friday to join his team mates in some light contact at practice, raising the prospect he could make an unlikely return for the stanley cup finals
document.title: stanley cup return possible for canucks center malhotra
lines_and_colors: vancouver canucks center manny malhotra was cleared on friday to join his team mates in some light contact at practice, raising the prospect he could make an unlikely return for the stanley cup finals
